description: These arenâ€™t your regular scrambled eggs. With amped-up ingredients like fried sausage, spring onion, spinach and thyme, this breakfast is a quick and tasty win.
keywords: Scrambled eggs,Sausage,Seafood free,Gluten free,Quick & easy breakfast,Tree nut free,Egg,Low sugar,Sesame free,Father's Day,High protein,Christmas,Wheat free,Pork,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Scrambled Eggs With Fried Sausage Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a medium saucepan over medium heat. Add sausage slices and stir occasionally until reheated. Remove from pan.
Add butter and heat until foaming. Meanwhile, whisk together eggs and milk and add to pan. Move mixture around the pan, scraping in from the edges until just cooked through.
Remove from heat and fold through sausage, spring onion, spinach and thyme. Season to taste and serve.
